parliamentary.service.title: Parliamentary Service
parliamentary.service.para: Elected to the House of Representatives for Prospect, New South Wales, 2004 and 2007.
Re-elected following the 2009 electoral redistribution for McMahon, New South Wales 2010 and 2013.

ministerial.appointments.title: Ministerial Appointments
ministerial.appointments.para: Minister for Competition Policy and Consumer Affairs from 3.12.07 to 9.6.09.
Minister for Financial Services, Superannuation and Corporate Law from 9.6.09 to 14.9.10.
Minister for Human Services from 9.6.09 to 14.9.10.
Minister for Immigration and Citizenship from 14.9.10 to 4.2.13.
Minister for Tertiary Education, Skills, Science and Research from 4.2.13 to 25.3.13.
Minister for Small Business from 4.2.13 to 25.3.13.

committee.service.title: Committee Service
committee.service.para: House of Representatives Standing: Economics, Finance and Public Administration from 2.12.04 to 7.12.05; Economics from 14.5.13 to 5.8.13; Education and Employment from 14.5.13 to 5.8.13.
Joint Statutory: Corporations and Financial Services from 2.12.04 to 17.10.07.

parliamentary.party.positions.title: Parliamentary Party Positions
parliamentary.party.positions.para: Acting Leader of the Federal Parliamentary Labor Party from 13.9.13 to 13.10.13.
Acting Leader of the Opposition from 18.9.13 to 13.10.13.

Member, Opposition Shadow Ministry from 10.12.06 to 3.12.07 and from 14.10.13. Shadow Assistant Treasurer from 10.12.06 to 3.12.07; Shadow Minister for Revenue and Competition Policy from 10.12.06 to 3.12.07.

party.positions.title: Party Positions
party.positions.para: President, ALP Fairfield State Electorate Council 1992-2005.

quals.work.pre.parliament.title: Qualifications and Occupation before entering Federal Parliament
quals.work.pre.parliament.para: Research and media officer to the Hon JA Crosio, MP 1994-95.
Senior adviser to the Hon. PC Scully, MLA (NSW) 2000-01; Chief of Staff 2001-04.

local.gov.service.title: Local Government Service
local.gov.service.para: President, Western Sydney Regional Organisation of Councils 1999-2001.

electorate.title: Electorate
electorate.para: Location: western Sydney; it includes the suburbs of Abbotsbury, Blacktown, Bossley Park, Canley Vale, Cecil Park, Eastern Creek, Edensor Park, Erskine Park, Fairfield, Fairfield Heights, Fairfield West, Greenfield Park, Greystanes, Horsley Park, Kemps Creek, Merrylands, Merrylands West, Mount Vernon, Orchard Hills, Pemulwuy, Prairiewood, Prospect, Smithfield, South Wentworthville, St Clair and Wetherill Park.
Industries: building and construction, light manufacturing, wholesale and retail, transport industry, agriculture and mixed farming.
State electorates: McMahon includes parts of the New South Wales Legislative Assembly electorates of Cabramatta, Fairfield, Granville, Mulgoa and Prospect.
